title: MC_GroupReadError (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK MC_GroupReadError
This function block reads general axis group errors not relating
to the function blocks.
Note
Examples are (software) limit switch exceeded or single axis error.

rows.Name: AxisGroup
rows.Comment: Reference to a group of axes

rows.Name: Enable
rows.Comment:
Get the value of theGroupErrorIDcontinuously while
enabled

rows: Signals that an error has occurred within the function block
The value of the axis group error
